channel.title: A couple GIMP works
channel.description:
Hello guys, I made a few more in GIMP, just trying to get better at GIMP and learn more about it's features! All of these (except the second) were inspired by other pictures!
[img]http://oi42.tinypic.com/2vt3zwy.jpg[/img]
(Wasn't trying to do any fancy background with this one) [img]http://oi40.tinypic.com/az42c.jpg[/img]
[img]http://i43.tinypic.com/1t09q8.jpg[/img]
Feedback and advice is appreciated!!

item.title: A couple GIMP works
item.dc:creator: @b00mz1029 b00mz1029
item.description:
@b00mz1029 wrote:

[quote=“eyeownyew, post:6, topic:519928”]You could just blur the border around the text (Filters -> Blur and light -> [experiment here]).

The fonts look a bit ‘edgy’, that’s what anti-aliasing is meant to fix. Makes it look clean and professional.

Overall, nice imo. Keep practicing.[/quote]
Thanks for the positive feedback and the tips! I’ll keep practicing for the simple fact that graphics are fun to make

Brooklynn:

The first design wa the best good work

Thanks for feedback!

Read full topic

item.title: A couple GIMP works
item.dc:creator: @eyeownyew Eyeownyew
item.description:
@eyeownyew wrote:

You could just blur the border around the text (Filters -> Blur and light -> [experiment here]).

The fonts look a bit ‘edgy’, that’s what anti-aliasing is meant to fix. Makes it look clean and professional.

Overall, nice imo. Keep practicing.

Read full topic

item.title: A couple GIMP works
item.dc:creator: @b00mz1029 b00mz1029
item.description:
@b00mz1029 wrote:

What’s anti-aliasing? And I know it may look like I used some cheap effect for the last one buy I really did create the effect, I’m just not super great at graphics so it may look like a cheap effect

Read full topic

item.title: A couple GIMP works
item.dc:creator: @bowserjr2 Bowser jr
item.description:
@bowserjr2 wrote:

You need to apply anti-aliasing on your text/pictures, or it look awful. The three last on look like you have used on cheap effect in GIMP and is quite boring.

Read full topic

item.title: A couple GIMP works
item.dc:creator: @b00mz1029 b00mz1029
item.description:
@b00mz1029 wrote:

[quote=“Kidpaparoach, post:2, topic:519928”]Sorry I’m not being really constructive. The frost dragon one looks okay but you imported the frost dragon image so it doesn’t really count ;x.

I’m not sure how you would improve on it personally, I think you’d be better of changing the style you used initially.[/quote]

On the Forst Dragon one, I did import it but it originally had a white background, I spent 30 mins cutting it out, pixel by pixel Thanks for feedback!

Read full topic

item.title: A couple GIMP works
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

Sorry I’m not being really constructive. The frost dragon one looks okay but you imported the frost dragon image so it doesn’t really count ;x.

I’m not sure how you would improve on it personally, I think you’d be better of changing the style you used initially.

Read full topic
